name: CAP_PAY_EL_MATCH_CVG_ATTR
description:
This table will be deprecated. To continue accessing this data, use the MATCHED_CVG_ATTR_C column from the CAP_PAY_EL_DETAILS table.





The coverage attributes matched to when returning the rate.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MATCHED_CVG_ATTR_C_NAME
columns.description: This column will be deprecated. To continue accessing this data, use the MATCHED_CVG_ATTR_C column from the CAP_PAY_EL_DETAILS table.  The coverage attributes used to select the rate groups from the lookup table.
